6. The gross examination reveals a dark brown-black pigmented mass in the choroidal region, with the sclera beneath the tumor appearing intact, which further supports the idea that the tumor is confined to the eye.

Based on these factors, I believe that the patient has a good chance of surviving after 2.11 years.
